text: geudeul-i yeoseong-ui il-e gwanhayeogeudaeege jilmunhalini galodoe hana nimkkeseo geunyeodeul-e daehae malsseum-i iss eulila ttohan gyesidoen seongseoe malsseum i issnola ttohan neohuiga jibulhaeya hal jichamgeum-eul jegonghaji anihago gyeolhonhagoja haneun goa yeoseong-gwa eon yaghan eolin-ideul-e gwanhan malsseum-i iss nani goadeul-ege gongjeonghala neohui ga haenghaneun eotteon seonhaengdo hananim-eun geugeos-e daehae algo gyesinila
